Workshop 1.name: Make a Custom Folded Paper Box!
Workshop 1.description: Learn to use the Cricut machine to make your own folding paper package.

Workshop 2.name: Intro to 3D Modeling
Workshop 2.description: Use Autodesk Fusion to learn the principles of 3D modeling.

Workshop 3.name: Intro to Civil Engineering Design
Workshop 3.description: Learn the principles of civil engineering design with this Autodesk collab.

Workshop 4.name: Intro to 3D Computer Graphics
Workshop 4.description: Learn the principles of 3D computer graphics with this Autodesk collab.
